00001 #ifndef TBTrack_SimConstants_HH
00002 #define TBTrack_SimConstants_HH
00003 
00004 // Constants needed for simulation of tracking chambers
00005 
00006 #include <string>
00007 #include <iostream>
00008 
00009 #include "AlnConstants.hh"
00010 
00011 //Forces the compiler to aling this class on a 32 bit boundary
00012 //Needed to protect implemented type 'safety' check
00013 #pragma pack (4)
00014 namespace TBTrack {
00015 
00016 class SimConstants : public AlnConstants {
00017 
00018 public:
00019   SimConstants(int p=0);
00020 
00021   // d is dimension; 0 = x, 1 = y
00022   // l is layer; 0-3 for DESY, 0-2 for CERN
00023   
00024   // Intrinsic chamber efficiency
00025   double cEffic(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00026   void   cEffic(unsigned d, unsigned l, double e);
00027 
00028   // Chamber hit smearing
00029   double cSmear(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00030   void   cSmear(unsigned d, unsigned l, double s);
00031 
00032   // Noise rate per mm per event
00033   double cNoise(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00034   void   cNoise(unsigned d, unsigned l, double n);
00035 
00036   // Effective t0 in ns
00037   double tTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00038   void   tTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l, double t);
00039 
00040   std::ostream& print(std::ostream &o=std::cout, const std::string &s="") const;
00041 
00042   enum {numberOfInts=1};
00043   const int* intData() const;
00044         int* intData();
00045 
00046   enum {numberOfFloats=0};
00047   const float* floatData() const;
00048         float* floatData();
00049 
00050   enum {numberOfDoubles=4*2*4 + AlnConstants::numberOfDoubles};
00051   const double* doubleData() const;
00052         double* doubleData();
00053 
00054 private:
00055 
00056   // Tracking chamber simulation constants
00057   double _cEffic[2][4];
00058   double _cSmear[2][4];
00059   double _cNoise[2][4];
00060   double _tTzero[2][4];
00061   int _period;
00062 };
00063 
00064 }
00065 //Reset the alignment
00066 #pragma pack()
